events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund immediately.
Issue has been classified under Refund cluster due to customer requesting money back for incorrect product.
The case has been assigned to support agent Maria for further handling and resolution.
Hello, thank you for contacting support. I’m Maria, and I’ll help you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify your claim?
Sure, my order number is 987654321 and I have attached photos of the wrong item shipped to me instead.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 3 to 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and refund confirmation. I appreciate your help resolving this.
The refund request has been resolved in our system and the process is underway on our side.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund. Please let us know if everything is settled or if you need more assistance.
I received the refund today. Everything is perfect now. Thank you for your excellent customer service.
Closing the case as the refund has been successfully processed and the customer has confirmed receipt.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to gather feedback on the refund experience.
